title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 262.6 - Directors and officers insurance limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 262.6 - Directors and officers insurance limitations

State Regulations
A directors and officers liability insurance policy that provides coverage for the acts of an officer or director of a corporation, as such term is defined in section
262.5
(b)(1)
of this Part, shall not provide coverage where indemnification is not permitted pursuant to the Business Corporation Law, Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, Banking Law or other applicable corporate statute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
262.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
